items.title_en: Keep Android Open
items.title_zh: 让 Android 保持开放
items.summary_en: FDroid-era openness is at stake as platforms push toward lock-in; the piece argues that keeping Android open accelerates innovation, boosts privacy, and lowers barriers for independent developers. It offers practical steps for contributors and users to support an open ecosystem.
items.summary_zh: 文章强调保持 Android 开放性的重要性，抵御日益增加的平台封闭与锁定。强调开放生态对创新、隐私的好处，以及对独立开发者的支持，提出参与开源应用与社区治理等具体做法。

items.title_en: I verified my LinkedIn identity. Here's what I handed over
items.title_zh: 我验证了我的 LinkedIn 身份，我交出了什么
items.summary_en: Explores what data is handed over during LinkedIn identity verification, revealing privacy implications and potential exposure.
items.summary_zh: 分析在 LinkedIn 身份验证过程中实际提交的数据及其隐私风险，揭示可能的暴露点，并给出用户在考虑身份验证时的实用建议。

items.title_en: How I use Claude Code: Separation of planning and execution
items.title_zh: 我如何使用 Claude Code：将规划与执行分离
items.summary_en: I describe using Claude Code with a clear separation between planning and execution. By isolating planning, you get more predictable, debuggable behavior and can swap execution strategies without reworking the plan. It helps manage complex workflows and reduces brittle prompts in production.
items.summary_zh: 作者分享在 Claude Code 中将规划与执行分离。分离计划阶段可以带来更可预测、可调试的行为，同时在不改动计划的前提下切换执行策略。此方法有助于处理复杂工作流，降低生产环境中提示的脆弱性。

items.title_en: How far back in time can you understand English?
items.title_zh: 你能理解多早期的英语？
items.summary_en: Old English, Middle English, and Early Modern English each present distinct vocabulary, grammar, and spelling gaps from modern usage. The piece surveys how far a typical reader can understand these stages and what tools help bridge the distance, such as glossaries and annotated editions. It notes that comprehension improves with exposure, but some periods remain opaque without study.
items.summary_zh: 古英语、中古英语和早期现代英语在词汇、语法和拼写上与现代英语存在显著差异。本文探讨普通读者在多大程度上能理解这些阶段，并介绍通过词汇表、注释版等工具来缩小差距的做法。理解能力会随着接触而提升，但若不系统学习，某些时期仍难以读懂。

items.title_en: What not to write on your security clearance form (1988)
items.title_zh: 填写安全许可申请表时不该写的内容
items.summary_en: Common security-clearance mistakes derail applications: inflating qualifications, omitting required disclosures, or flagging risky personal associations. The piece maps these pitfalls to practical strategies—be honest, concise, and consistent, and explain any tricky items with proper context to minimize red flags. It also stresses alignment across related forms to avoid inconsistent narratives.
items.summary_zh: 在安全许可申请表中，常见错误会导致申请被拒：夸大资历、遗漏必填披露信息，以及暴露可能带来风险的个人关系。文章将这些坑点映射到实用策略，强调诚实、简洁、前后一致，并在需要时给出合理解释以降低红旗风险。 同时强调相关表格之间的一致性，避免叙述不一致。

items.title_en: Claws are now a new layer on top of LLM agents
items.title_zh: Claws 成为大语言模型代理的新层
items.summary_en: Claws adds a new layer on top of LLM agents to improve safety, governance, and composability of autonomous tasks. It aims to provide a modular framework that handles orchestration, policy enforcement, and error handling beyond a single prompt. This could advance reliable agent AI, though adoption details remain to be seen.
items.summary_zh: Claws 在大语言模型代理之上引入新的一层，提升自治任务的安全性、治理与模块化能力，提供用于编排、策略执行和错误处理的分层框架。此举有望推动更可靠的代理式 AI，但具体落地与普及情况尚待观察。

items.title_en: Attention Media ≠ Social Networks
items.title_zh: 注意力媒体与社交网络的区别
items.summary_en: Attention media are engineered to maximize engagement, while social networks prioritize network effects and user-generated content.
items.summary_zh: 注意力媒体被设计来最大化参与度，而社交网络以网络效应和用户生成内容为核心。本文探讨了对出版商、开发者和平台设计的影响，强调信任、盈利模式与内容韧性等方面的后果。

items.title_en: Show HN: Llama 3.1 70B on a single RTX 3090 via NVMe-to-GPU bypassing the CPU
items.title_zh: Show HN：在单张 RTX 3090 上用 NVMe–GPU 直连实现 Llama 3.1 70B，绕过 CPU
items.summary_en: Show HN demonstrates Llama 3.1 70B running on a single RTX 3090 by bypassing CPU bottlenecks with an NVMe-to-GPU path. The approach leans on streaming weights and memory-efficient techniques to fit a large model on consumer hardware, signaling a path for hobbyists and small teams.
items.summary_zh: Show HN 展示了在单张 RTX 3090 上通过 NVMe–GPU 直连绕过 CPU 瓶颈来运行 Llama 3.1 70B。该方法依赖权重流式加载与节省内存的技巧，使大型模型在消费级硬件上可用，给爱好者和小团队开辟了新路径。

items.title_en: How Taalas “prints” LLM onto a chip?
items.title_zh: Taalas 如何将大型语言模型印在芯片上？
items.summary_en: It weighs latency, privacy, and energy trade-offs that come with on-device AI deployment.
items.summary_zh: 文章探讨在硬件上运行大型语言模型的思路，涉及片上存储、优化技术与专用加速器等要点。讨论了边缘部署对延迟、隐私与能耗的取舍。

items.title_en: AI uBlock Blacklist
items.title_zh: AI 版 uBlock 黑名单
items.summary_en: This repository curates ad-blocking filters leveraging AI to identify and block content that resembles ads or trackers, aiming to improve the effectiveness of ad blockers in AI-enabled browsing.
items.summary_zh: 该仓库提供用于 uBlock Origin 等广告拦截器的 AI 驱动过滤清单，旨在更准确地识别并屏蔽与 AI 相关的广告和跟踪。

items.title_en: Gamedate – A site to revive dead multiplayer games
items.title_zh: Gamedate：一个让已停运的多人游戏重获新生的平台
items.summary_en: Gamedate provides a venue for reviving abandoned multiplayer games by coordinating communities, matchmaking, and mods around legacy titles. It highlights community-driven preservation as a way to extend the life of classic games and reduce waste.
items.summary_zh: Gamedate 为复兴已停运的多人游戏提供平台，帮助社区组织、重建匹配与模组，让经典作品重新活跃。此举体现通过社区力量延长游戏生命、降低资源浪费的趋势。

items.title_en: CXMT has been offering DDR4 chips at about half the prevailing market rate
items.title_zh: CXMT 正以约市场价一半的价格提供 DDR4 芯片
items.summary_en: CXMT has been offering DDR4 chips at about half the prevailing market rate. This aggressive pricing hints at oversupply, regional subsidies, or strategic dumping that could pressure rivals. Buyers may benefit from lower costs but should watch for quality variance, supply stability, and downstream pricing impacts.
items.summary_zh: 据报道，CXMT 以约市场价一半的价格出售 DDR4 芯片。这表明可能存在产能过剩、政府补贴或策略性抛售等因素，可能压低行业价格。买家应关注质量、供货稳定性，以及对下游厂商和市场格局的影响。

items.title_en: zclaw: personal AI assistant in under 888 KB, running on an ESP32
items.title_zh: zclaw：在 ESP32 上运行、仅 888 KB 的个人 AI 助手
items.summary_en: Shows a personal AI assistant that runs on an ESP32 within 888 KB, demonstrating the feasibility of ultra-lightweight AI in embedded devices. The project highlights the engineering trade-offs between memory, latency, and offline capability.
items.summary_zh: 展示在 ESP32 上仅 888 KB 的个人 AI 助手的实现，证明极小体积的 AI 也能在嵌入式设备上运行。该项目揭示了内存、延迟和离线能力之间的取舍。

items.title_en: Parse, Don't Validate and Type-Driven Design in Rust
items.title_zh: Rust 的“解析优先”与类型驱动设计
items.summary_en: Promotes parsing-first validation and type-driven design in Rust, arguing that the right types should encode invariants and that parsing should produce clean, well-formed data. The approach leverages Rust’s strong type system—newtypes, enums, and type-level guarantees—to reduce runtime validation and make API boundaries safer.
items.summary_zh: 提倡在 Rust 中采用解析优先的验证和类型驱动设计，即通过类型对不变量进行编码，让解析直接产出正确的数据结构。依托强类型系统（新类型、枚举、类型级保证）来减少运行时校验，使 API 边界更安全。

items.title_en: Iran students stage first large anti-government protests since deadly crackdown
items.title_zh: 伊朗学生在致命镇压后首次举行大规模抗议
items.summary_en: Iranian students have staged sizable anti-government demonstrations, marking the first major protests since a deadly crackdown. The movement underscores rising student activism and the delicate balance of security measures and civil dissent. The tech angle includes monitoring, internet access controls, and how digital tools shape protest organization.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗学生在致命镇压后首次举行大规模抗议，标志着抗议热潮的延续。这一行动凸显了学生群体在政治变局中的积极作用，以及政府维稳的挑战。数字工具在组织与监控方面的作用也成为关注点。

items.title_en: EDuke32 – Duke Nukem 3D (Open-Source)
items.title_zh: EDuke32：Duke Nukem 3D 的开源实现
items.summary_en: EDuke32 is a modern open-source port of Duke Nukem 3D built on the Build engine, bringing updated rendering and cross-platform support to a classic shooter. It adds tooling for mods and expansions, inviting preservation-minded players and hobby developers to experiment with source code and assets.
items.summary_zh: EDuke32 是 Duke Nukem 3D 的开源移植，基于 Build 引擎，提供现代渲染和跨平台支持。它为模组和扩展提供工具，适合热爱复古游戏的玩家与开发者探索源码与资产。

items.title_en: A16z partner says that the theory that we’ll vibe code everything is wrong
items.title_zh: A16z 合伙人称，用代码解决一切的理论是错误的
items.summary_en: A16z partner argues that the idea we’ll vibe code everything is wrong; real-world product success requires human insight, domain context, and governance. The piece urges founders to pair automation with judgment and ethics.
items.summary_zh: A16z 合伙人认为“用代码解决一切”是错误的；现实世界的产品成功需要人类洞察、领域背景与治理。文章敦促创始人将自动化与判断、伦理结合起来。

items.title_en: Evidence of the bouba-kiki effect in naïve baby chicks
items.title_zh: 未经训练的小鸡对 Bouba–Kiki 效应的证据
items.summary_en: The bouba–kiki effect appears in naïve chicks, suggesting early cross-modal mappings are not unique to humans. The finding informs debates on perceptual biases, cognition, and language evolution across species.
items.summary_zh: 在未经训练的小鸡中也观察到 Bouba–Kiki 效应，表明早期感知-形象映射并非人类独有。此发现为跨物种的感知偏好、认知与语言起源研究提供证据与启示。

items.title_en: Back to FreeBSD: Part 1
items.title_zh: 重返 FreeBSD：第一部分
items.summary_en: An introduction to FreeBSD's design philosophy, highlighting performance, security, and advanced networking features. The piece touches on recent updates and the ecosystem, outlining scenarios where FreeBSD remains compelling for modern workloads.
items.summary_zh: 本文介绍 FreeBSD 的设计哲学，强调其性能、安全性与先进网络特性。内容涵盖近期更新与生态系统，勾勒出在现代工作负载中 FreeBSD 仍具吸引力的场景。

items.title_en: Japanese Woodblock Print Search
items.title_zh: 日本浮世绘检索
items.summary_en: A dedicated search tool for Japanese woodblock prints collects metadata and high-resolution scans of ukiyo-e. The engine makes it easy to browse thousands of prints, explore artists and studios, and trace provenance.
items.summary_zh: 这是一个专门检索日本浮世绘的工具，汇集了大量作品的元数据与高分辨率影像。该检索支持研究者与爱好者轻松浏览数千幅作品，了解艺术家、流派与出处，推动相关研究与收藏工作。

items.title_en: Two Bits Are Better Than One: making bloom filters 2x more accurate
items.title_zh: 两个比特比一个更好：让布隆过滤器精确度提升两倍
items.summary_en: Two bits per Bloom filter cell can halve false positives compared to the traditional single-bit version. The approach trades a modest memory increase for much higher accuracy, benefiting large caches, search systems, and network infrastructure.
items.summary_zh: 布隆过滤器的每个单元用两个比特即可将误报率降至原来的一半左右。该做法在增加少量内存开销的同时显著提升准确性，适用于大规模缓存、搜索系统和网络基础设施。

items.title_en: Don't create .gitkeep files, use .gitignore instead (2023)
items.title_zh: 不要创建 .gitkeep 文件，改用 .gitignore
items.summary_en: Argues for using .gitignore to ignore empty directories rather than keeping .gitkeep placeholders. It covers practical patterns and pitfalls, helping maintain a clean repo.
items.summary_zh: 主张用 .gitignore 忽略空目录，而不是添加 .gitkeep 作为占位。文章给出实际的模式和注意事项，帮助保持代码仓库整洁。

items.title_en: Toyota’s hydrogen-powered Mirai has experienced rapid depreciation
items.title_zh: 丰田氢动力 Mirai 的快速折旧
items.summary_en: Toyota Mirai's hydrogen-powered car has seen steep depreciation, signaling market headwinds for hydrogen tech and shifting consumer demand. The story warns about the risk of early tech bets in auto propulsion.
items.summary_zh: 丰田氢动力 Mirai 的折旧速度迅速，显示出氢能源汽车技术路线的市场挑战与消费者需求的转变。警示未来汽车推进中的早期技术投资风险。

items.title_en: Permacomputing
items.title_zh: 永续计算
items.summary_en: Permacomputing blends permaculture principles with computing to design sustainable tech ecosystems. It advocates energy-efficient hardware, distributed resilience, and open, community-driven maintenance to reduce e-waste and long-term costs. The field encourages critiquing growth-centric tech culture and exploring less resource-intensive deployment.
items.summary_zh: 永续计算将永续耕作的原则应用到计算领域，旨在设计更可持续的技术生态。它提倡使用节能硬件、分布式韧性以及开放、由社区推动的维护模式，以减少电子垃圾和长期成本。这一理念也在批判以增长为导向的科技文化，探讨资源占用更低的部署方案。

items.title_en: I Don't Like Magic
items.title_zh: 我不喜欢魔法式编程
items.summary_en: Reasoning against 'magic' in software, the post champions explicit, readable code and transparent behavior over clever abstractions.
items.summary_zh: 文章反对软件中的“魔法做法”，主张以明确、易读的实现和透明的行为来取代高深但不透明的技巧。

items.title_en: What Is a Database Transaction?
items.title_zh: 数据库事务是什么
items.summary_en: A database transaction is a sequence of operations treated as a single unit, guaranteeing atomicity, consistency, isolation, and durability (ACID). It matters for data integrity under concurrent workloads and in error handling, with practical examples like transfers or multi-step updates.
items.summary_zh: 数据库事务是一组作为一个原子单元执行的操作，确保原子性、一致性、隔离性和持久性（ACID）。在并发工作负载和错误处理场景中，它对数据完整性至关重要，通过诸如转账或多步更新等示例直观展示。

items.title_en: A Botnet Accidentally Destroyed I2P
items.title_zh: 一个僵尸网络意外摧毁了 I2P
items.summary_en: A botnet incident inadvertently destroyed I2P infrastructure, showing how abuse of privacy tools can ripple through decentralized networks. The article traces how malicious traffic affected routing and what operators did to recover, underscoring fragility and the need for hardening.
items.summary_zh: 一起僵尸网络事件意外破坏了 I2P 基础设施，揭示隐私工具被滥用时对去中心化网络的连锁影响。报道梳理了恶意流量如何干扰路由及运营方的应对，凸显网络的脆弱性以及需要加强防护。

items.title_en: We hid backdoors in ~40MB binaries and asked AI + Ghidra to find them
items.title_zh: 我们在约 40MB 的二进制中藏入后门，并让 AI 与 Ghidra 找出它们
items.summary_en: A research-style post reveals a deliberate backdoor in ~40MB binaries and documents the process of using AI and the Ghidra reverse-engineering suite to detect it. It underscores how automated analysis can uncover stealthy malicious payloads at binary scale. The piece offers practical lessons for red-team exercises and blue-team defenses.
items.summary_zh: 这篇研究式博客展示了在约 40MB 的二进制文件中有意隐藏后门的情形，并用 AI 与 Ghidra 来检测它们。说明了自动化分析在大规模二进制检测中的作用及潜在威胁。给红队演练与蓝队防御提供了实用经验教训。

items.title_en: Coccinelle: Source-to-source transformation tool
items.title_zh: Coccinelle：源代码级转换工具
items.summary_en: Coccinelle is a framework for automating source-to-source transformations in codebases, enabling large-scale refactors and bug fixes with pattern matching and semantic-preserving rewrites. It aids maintainers in applying consistent changes across projects.
items.summary_zh: Coccinelle 是一个用于在代码库中实现源代码级转换的框架，能够通过模式匹配和语义保持的重写实现大规模重构与修复。有助于维护者在项目中应用一致的改动。

items.title_en: Canvas_ity: A tiny, single-header <canvas>-like 2D rasterizer for C++
items.title_zh: Canvas_ity：一个极小、单头文件的 C++ 2D 光栅化库
items.summary_en: Canvas_ity is a tiny, single-header 2D rasterizer for C++, offering a Canvas-like API with minimal dependencies. It's suitable for tiny demos, educational projects, or embedding in tools where keeping the build simple matters.
items.summary_zh: Canvas_ity 是一个极小的、单头文件的 C++ 2D 光栅化库，提供类似 Canvas 的接口且依赖极少。非常适合小型演示、教学项目或需要简单构建的新工具。

items.title_en: Man accidentally gains control of 7k robot vacuums
items.title_zh: 男子意外获得对约 7000 台扫地机器人的控制权
items.summary_en: A man inadvertently gains control of around 7,000 robotic vacuums, exposing how insecure IoT deployments can be weaponized or misused. The incident spotlights the need for safer defaults, firmware updates, and robust access controls in consumer robotics. It also raises questions about surveillance perimeter and botnet risk in dense deployments.
items.summary_zh: 一名男子在不经意间获得对约 7000 台扫地机器人的控制权，暴露了物联设备的安全漏洞。此事件凸显了对普通消费级机器人设定更安全的默认设置、固件更新与访问控制的必要性。与此同时也引发对在密集部署中的监控与僵尸网络风险的关注。

items.title_en: Inputlag.science – Repository of knowledge about input lag in gaming
items.title_zh: Inputlag.science：游戏输入延迟知识库
items.summary_en: This repository aggregates knowledge about gaming input lag, covering measurement methods, testing setups, and practical guidance to reduce latency for both hardware and software. The collection helps developers, testers, and competitive gamers understand and improve perceived responsiveness.
items.summary_zh: 该知识库汇总了游戏输入延迟的测量方法、测试流程，以及降低延迟的实用建议，涵盖硬件与软件多方面。为开发者、测试人员和竞技玩家提供理解并提升响应性的参考。

items.title_en: Microsoft team creates data-storage system that lasts for millennia
items.title_zh: 微软团队开发可持续千年的数据存储系统
items.summary_en: A Microsoft team proposes data storage technology aimed at ultra-long-term durability, capable of surviving millennia, highlighting the challenges and importance of archiving critical data.
items.summary_zh: 微软团队提出旨在实现超长期持久性的的数据存储技术，能够经受千年甚至更久的寿命，凸显持久存档的重要性与相关挑战。

items.title_en: Carelessness versus craftsmanship in cryptography
items.title_zh: 密码学中的粗心与匠心
items.summary_en: The post contrasts sloppy cryptography with craftsmanship, arguing that secure designs come from disciplined engineering rather than quick fixes. It outlines best practices from threat modeling to rigorous verification to mitigate real-world risk.
items.summary_zh: 文章对比了粗心的密码学实践与匠心之作，强调安全设计来自周密的工程实践而非临时修补。提出从威胁建模到严格验证等一系列最佳实践以降低现实风险。

items.title_en: Show HN: Iron-Wolf – Wolfenstein 3D source port in Rust
items.title_zh: Show HN：Iron-Wolf——用 Rust 实现的 Wolfenstein 3D 源码移植
items.summary_en: Rust-based source port of the classic Wolfenstein 3D demonstrates how modern language safety and ecosystem can revive retro games. Iron-Wolf focuses on clean code, portability, and potential performance gains, offering a case study in Rust-driven game porting. The project also shows the balance between authenticity and safety in emulation-like efforts.
items.summary_zh: 基于 Rust 的经典 Wolfenstein 3D 源码移植展示了现代语言的安全性与生态系统如何促成复古游戏的再现。Iron-Wolf 注重代码整洁、可移植性，以及潜在的性能提升，成为 Rust 驱动的移植案例。该项目也揭示了在保真度与安全性之间寻求平衡的挑战。

items.title_en: Fix Your Tools
items.title_zh: 修复你的工具
items.summary_en: A pragmatic guide to auditing and repairing your development tools and workflows to boost reliability and speed.
items.summary_zh: 提供一个务实的指南，用于审视并修复开发工具与工作流，以提升可靠性和效率。

items.title_en: Scientists discover recent tectonic activity on the moon
items.title_zh: 科学家在月球上发现最近的地质构造活动
items.summary_en: Researchers report evidence of recent tectonic activity on the Moon, suggesting it's geologically active on human timescales. The finding challenges the idea of a completely dormant Moon and has implications for future missions and surface operations.
items.summary_zh: 研究者发现月球存在最近的构造活动，表明月球在人的时间尺度内仍具地质活动。这个发现挑战了月球长期处于休眠状态的观点，并影响未来阿尔忒弥斯计划及月面任务的规划。

items.title_en: Xweather Live – Interactive global vector weather map
items.title_zh: Xweather Live：全球矢量天气地图的交互式体验
items.summary_en: Xweather Live presents an interactive, vector-based global weather map that updates in real time. By using vector tiles, it can render smooth zoomable weather data across scales while keeping file size modest. The project highlights how vector-based weather visualization can offer scalable clarity for dashboards and research.
items.summary_zh: Xweather Live 提供一个交互式的全球矢量天气地图，支持实时更新。通过矢量切片实现，可以在不同尺度下平滑缩放并保持较小的文件尺寸。该项目凸显了矢量化天气可视化在仪表盘和研究中的可扩展清晰度。

items.title_en: How I launched 3 consoles and found true love at Babbage's store no. 9 (2013)
items.title_zh: 我在 Babbage 的第9号门店发布三款主机并找到真爱的经历（2013）
items.summary_en: A personal recollection from 2013 about launching three consoles at a specific Babbage’s store and the ensuing romance. The piece offers a human-scale glimpse into retail culture and hardware launches.
items.summary_zh: 作者在 2013 年的个人回忆，讲述在 Babbage 的门店发布三款主机并因此邂逅真爱。文章提供了对零售文化与硬件发布背后的人情味的观察。

items.title_en: ReferenceFinder: Find coordinates on a piece of paper with only folds
items.title_zh: ReferenceFinder：仅用折痕在纸上定位坐标
items.summary_en: ReferenceFinder demonstrates a method to locate coordinates on paper using only folds, without any marks. It showcases principles of computational origami with potential applications in portable navigation, AR calibration, or lightweight geospatial encoding.
items.summary_zh: ReferenceFinder 展示了一种仅靠折痕在纸上定位坐标的方法，无需任何标记。它体现了计算机折纸的原理，潜在应用包括便携导航、增强现实标定或轻量级地理编码。

items.title_en: Minions: Stripe's one-shot, end-to-end coding agents – Stripe Dot Dev Blog
items.title_zh: Minions：Stripe 的一次性端到端编码代理
items.summary_en: Stripe showcases autonomous coding agents capable of performing end-to-end tasks in a single run, illustrating a path toward automating developer workflows.
items.summary_zh: Stripe 展示了一种能够一次性完成端到端任务的自主编码代理，展示了开发者工作流自动化的潜在路径。文章讨论了体系结构、安全性考量，以及它在 Stripe 工具生态中的定位。

items.title_en: Unreal numbers
items.title_zh: 虚幻的数字
items.summary_en: A provocative take on numbers that feel unreal—non-intuitive representations and mathematical abstractions shaping computing and data. The piece challenges conventional intuition about what numbers mean in practice.
items.summary_zh: 对“虚幻的数字”进行挑衅性探讨：在计算与数据处理中，非直觉的表示与数学抽象如何塑形现实。文章挑战了我们对于数字在实际中的意义的直觉。

items.title_en: Finding forall-exists Hyperbugs using Symbolic Execution
items.title_zh: 通过符号执行发现 forall-exists 的缺陷
items.summary_en: Symbolic execution is used to find forall-exists bugs, showing how formal methods can automate deep checks over quantified conditions. The work advances software reliability in areas like compilers and verifiers.
items.summary_zh: 研究者用符号执行来发现 forall–exists 的缺陷，展示了形式化方法在对量化条件进行深度检查方面的自动化能力。此类工作提升了编译器与验证工具等领域的软件可靠性。

items.title_en: The Four-Color Theorem 1852–1976
items.title_zh: 四色定理：1852–1976 的历程
items.summary_en: The article traces the four-color theorem from its 19th-century conjecture to the mid-20th-century computer-assisted proof. It demonstrates how collaboration between mathematicians and computers changed the way we validate proofs. The story offers a lens on the history of computational mathematics and the limits of human-only reasoning.
items.summary_zh: 本文梳理四色定理从提出到通过计算机辅助证明的历程。数学家与计算机的协作改变了证明的验证方式，也凸显了计算在人类推理中的作用。这是对计算数学史与理论界限的深刻反思。

items.title_en: Fungicide vinclozin causes disease via germline for 20 generations in rats
items.title_zh: 杀菌剂 vinclozin 通过生殖系造成大鼠多代疾病
items.summary_en: New research shows fungicide vinclozin can cause disease through the germline across 20 rat generations, indicating potential transgenerational effects. The findings spur safety and regulatory considerations for chemical exposure and health outcomes. It emphasizes the importance of long-term, multigenerational studies in toxicology.
items.summary_zh: 新研究显示杀菌剂 vinclozin 通过生殖系造成大鼠多代疾病，具有潜在的跨代效应。研究结果推动对化学暴露与健康后果的安全性与监管讨论，并强调在毒理学中进行长期、多代研究的重要性。

items.title_en: Show HN: 3D Mahjong, Built in CSS
items.title_zh: Show HN：用 CSS 构建的 3D 麻将
items.summary_en: A Show HN project demonstrates 3D Mahjong rendered with pure CSS, showcasing how far CSS transforms and perspective can push browser rendering without heavy WebGL. The build serves as both a playful demo and a reference for CSS-driven 3D layouts. It hints at potential performance and accessibility tradeoffs for CSS-only approaches.
items.summary_zh: 这是一个 Show HN 项目，展示了用纯 CSS 实现的 3D 麻将。它展示了 CSS 变换和透视在无需 WebGL 的情况下实现 3D 的潜力。该作品既是趣味演示，也为 CSS 驱动的 3D 布局提供参考，同时提示了在纯 CSS 方法下的性能与可访问性取舍。

items.title_en: Volatility: The volatile memory forensic extraction framework
items.title_zh: Volatility：易失性内存取证框架
items.summary_en: Volatility 3 is a memory-forensics framework for extracting artifacts from RAM dumps. The release highlights Python 3 support, a pluggable architecture, and improved tooling for incident response and evidence preservation.
items.summary_zh: Volatility 3 是一个从 RAM 转储中提取证据的内存取证框架。新版本强调对 Python 3 的支持、可插拔架构，以及用于事件响应和证据留存的改进工具链。

items.title_en: What's the best way to learn a new language?
items.title_zh: 学习新语言的最佳方法是什么
items.summary_en: Advocates evidence-based strategies such as immersion, spaced repetition, deliberate practice, and meaningful context. Emphasizes setting clear goals, staying consistent, and using real-world communication to accelerate mastery.
items.summary_zh: 倡导基于证据的学习策略，如沉浸式练习、间隔重复、刻意练习和有意义的语境。强调设定明确目标、保持持续性，并通过真实沟通来加速掌握。

items.title_en: The Dance Floor Is Disappearing in a Sea of Phones
items.title_zh: 手机潮水中，舞池正在消失
items.summary_en: A deep dive into how a boom in electronic dance music intersects with widespread smartphone use, altering live performance, crowd dynamics, and club culture.
items.summary_zh: 深入分析电子舞曲热潮如何遇上普及的智能手机使用，改变现场表演、人群动态与夜店文化。本文探讨技术重塑夜生活体验对艺术家、场馆和观众的取舍。

items.title_en: Yet Another Fix Coming for Older AMD GPUs on Linux – Thanks to Valve Developer
items.title_zh: 又一修复将解决 Linux 上旧 AMD GPU 的问题——感谢 Valve 开发者
items.summary_en: Valve contributors have helped surface a fix for older AMD GPUs on Linux, addressing DC (display core) and driver issues that hinder hardware acceleration. The patch improves stability and performance for users on Hawaii-era cards and similar hardware. It reflects the ongoing, crowd-sourced momentum behind open-source drivers.
items.summary_zh: 来自 Valve 的贡献者推动了 Linux 上旧 AMD GPU 的修复，解决显示核心等驱动问题。补丁提升 Hawaii 系列显卡在 Linux 下的稳定性与性能。这体现了社区协作对开源显卡驱动持续迭代的重要性。

items.title_en: Monkey Patching in VBA
items.title_zh: VBA 的猴子补丁
items.summary_en: It shows practical patterns, caveats, and risks of breaking compatibility or introducing fragile code. The piece serves as a cautionary guide for developers embedding VBA in business apps.
items.summary_zh: 文章探讨了 VBA 中的猴子补丁（monkey patching）技术，展示如何在运行时修改或扩展现有对象行为。它给出可操作的模式、注意事项与可能破坏性风险的分析。适用于在企业应用中嵌入 VBA 的开发者，但也提醒其潜在的稳定性与兼容性问题。

items.title_en: Show HN: Minimalist Glitch Art Maker (100% client-side)
items.title_zh: Show HN：极简 glitch 艺术生成器（100% 客户端）
items.summary_en: A minimalist glitch art tool that runs entirely in the browser, emphasizing client-side privacy and offline capability. It showcases approachable creative coding with a clean, fast UI.
items.summary_zh: 一个在浏览器内完全运行的极简 glitch 艺术生成器，强调客户端隐私与离线能力。展示了直观的创意编码与简洁高效的界面。

items.title_en: Git's Magic Files
items.title_zh: Git 的魔法文件
items.summary_en: The article digs into Git's lesser-known magic files—configurations and attributes that alter how Git behaves beyond ordinary commands. It explains how files like .gitattributes and .gitignore influence merging, pathspecs, and cross-repo tooling. The takeaway is that small, well-chosen magic files can dramatically simplify repository hygiene and collaboration.
items.summary_zh: 文章梳理了 Git 中鲜为人知的神奇/魔法文件及其对行为的影响。它解释了 .gitattributes、.gitignore 等文件如何影响合并、路径模式以及跨仓工具。小而巧妙的“魔法文件”可以显著简化仓库治理与协作。

items.title_en: Show HN: TLA+ Workbench skill for coding agents (compat. with Vercel skills CLI)
items.title_zh: Show HN：TLA+ Workbench 技能用于编码代理（与 Vercel Skills CLI 兼容）
items.summary_en: A Show HN introduces a TLA+ Workbench skill for coding agents, bridging formal methods tooling with real-world dev workflows. It also notes compatibility with the Vercel skills CLI, enabling agents to plug into modern deployments. The snippet signals growing interest in rigorous, model-driven automation for production systems.
items.summary_zh: Show HN 介绍了一个用于编码代理的 TLA+ Workbench 技能，结合正式方法工具与实际开发工作流。并指出可以与 Vercel skills CLI 兼容，使代理能够接入现代部署。这反映了对面向生产的模型驱动自动化需求的增长趋势。

items.title_en: A New Perspective on Drawing Venn Diagrams for Data Visualization
items.title_zh: 用于数据可视化的维恩图绘制新视角
items.summary_en: Proposes a fresh perspective on drawing Venn diagrams for data visualization, addressing readability for multi-set diagrams and comparing alternatives like Euler diagrams.
items.summary_zh: 提出一种绘制维恩图以用于数据可视化的新视角，解决多集合情形的可读性问题，并比较如欧拉图等替代方法。文章讨论其数学基础与认知考虑。

items.title_en: I Analyzed Every Nootropic Study on PubMed
items.title_zh: 我分析了 PubMed 上的所有认知增强剂研究
items.summary_en: A comprehensive audit of PubMed entries on nootropics finds a patchwork of evidence, with many claims lacking robust clinical support and varying study quality. The writer highlights how publication bias and small sample sizes skew impressions of efficacy. The takeaway is skepticism toward “brain-boosting” pills without rigorous, replicated data.
items.summary_zh: 对 PubMed 上关于认知增强剂的研究进行了全面评估，结果显示证据往往不稳固、质量参差不齐。出版偏倚和样本量小等因素会扭曲“脑力提升”效能的印象。结论是，缺乏鲁棒的重复性数据就难以把认知增强剂的效果当成可靠结论。

items.title_en: Conway's Arcade
items.title_zh: 康威的街机
items.summary_en: Conway's Arcade blends Conway-style cellular automata with arcade gameplay, illustrating how simple rules yield emergent, visually engaging experiences. It serves as a playful exploration of computation and education through interactive media.
items.summary_zh: 将康威式元胞自动机与街机玩法相结合，展示简单规则如何产生涌现式、吸引眼球的体验。作品通过互动媒介，作为对计算与教育的一种有趣探索。

items.title_en: Amazon, Meta, Alphabet report plunging tax bills thanks to AI and tax changes
items.title_zh: 因为 AI 投资及税法调整，亚马逊、Meta、Alphabet 税负大幅下降
items.summary_en: Major tech giants report plunging tax bills driven by AI investments and Washington’s tax changes, illustrating how incentives and write-offs reshape profitability. The numbers reflect a combination of R&D credits, rate changes, and international restructuring. It signals how policy and AI spending are increasingly intertwined with corporate finance.
items.summary_zh: 因 AI 投资和税法变化，亚马逊、Meta、Alphabet 的税单大幅下降。这反映了研发抵税、税率变化以及国际结构调整如何影响利润表。显示出政策、AI 支出与企业财务之间日益紧密的互动。

items.title_en: Sewage Spill in the Potomac River
items.title_zh: 波托马克河污水泄漏事件
items.summary_en: A sewage spill into the Potomac River triggers public health advisories and water-quality monitoring. The report outlines the time frame, anticipated impact, and ongoing response measures by authorities.
items.summary_zh: 波托马克河发生污水泄漏，引发公共健康警报与水质监测。报道提供泄漏时间、预期影响以及相关部门的应急处置进展。

items.title_en: Fedify 2.0.0: Modular architecture, debug dashboard, and relay support
items.title_zh: Fedify 2.0.0：模块化架构、调试仪表板与中继支持
items.summary_en: Fedify 2.0.0 introduces modular architecture, a debugging dashboard, and relay support, boosting extensibility and observability. The release emphasizes better tooling for federated or distributed applications.
items.summary_zh: Fedify 2.0.0 引入模块化架构、调试仪表板与中继支持，提升可扩展性与可观测性。此次更新强调为联邦化或分布式应用提供更强的工具链。

items.title_en: Holo v0.9: A Modern Routing Stack Built in Rust
items.title_zh: Holo v0.9：用 Rust 构建的现代路由栈
items.summary_en: Holo v0.9 releases a modern routing stack built in Rust, emphasizing safety, modularity, and performance. The update offers clearer APIs and improved routing capabilities for network software developers.
items.summary_zh: Holo v0.9 发布，基于 Rust 构建的现代路由栈，强调安全性、模块化与性能。新版本提供更清晰的 API 与改进的路由能力，面向网络软件开发者。

items.title_en: Introduction to Out of Time Order Correlators (OTOCs)(2025)
items.title_zh: OTOC 入门（2025）
items.summary_en: Out-of-time-order correlators introduce a framework to measure information scrambling and chaos in quantum systems. The primer explains the intuition, typical definitions, and why OTOCs matter for understanding quantum dynamics and error mitigation. It's a useful entry point for readers curious about quantum information and hardware-aware theory.
items.summary_zh: OTOC 为量子系统的信息扩散和混乱程度提供衡量框架。该入门文章解释了定义、直觉及其在理解量子动力学与误差抑制中的作用。是对量子信息与硬件相关理论兴趣读者的实用入口。

items.title_en: The Biophysical World Inside a Jam-Packed Cell
items.title_zh: 拥挤细胞中的生物物理世界
items.summary_en: Explores how macromolecular crowding within cells shapes reaction rates, diffusion, and organization.
items.summary_zh: 探讨细胞内部高分子拥挤如何影响反应速率、扩散与分子组织。文章强调影响生物学研究与药物开发的生物物理原理。

items.title_en: Met police using AI tools supplied by Palantir to flag officer misconduct
items.title_zh: 大都会警察使用 Palantir 提供的 AI 工具来标记警官不当行为
items.summary_en: The Met Police deploys Palantir-supplied AI to flag potential officer misconduct, raising concerns about bias, transparency, and governance. The deployment highlights the tension between advanced analytics and civil liberties in policing.
items.summary_zh: 大都会警察局正在使用 Palantir 提供的 AI 工具来标记潜在的不当行为，引发对偏见、透明度与治理的担忧。这一部署凸显了在执法场景中先进分析与公民自由之间的张力。

items.title_en: Fresh File Explorer – VS Code extension for navigating recent work
items.title_zh: Fresh File Explorer：VS Code 的最近工作导航扩展
items.summary_en: Fresh File Explorer is a VS Code extension designed to speed up navigation by exposing recent files and work sessions in an accessible panel. It reduces context-switching and helps developers jump back into work faster. The extension demonstrates a shift toward more ergonomic, task-focused tooling inside editors.
items.summary_zh: Fresh File Explorer 是一个 VS Code 扩展，旨在通过展示最近的文件和工作会话来提升导航效率。它可以减少上下文切换，帮助开发者更快回到正在做的事。这一扩展体现了编辑器内更注重任务导向的工具设计趋势。

items.title_en: Show HN: Cryphos – no-code crypto signal bot with Telegram alerts
items.title_zh: Show HN：Cryphos——无代码的加密信号机器人，提供 Telegram 提醒
items.summary_en: Cryphos offers a no-code crypto signal bot with Telegram alerts, lowering the barrier to automated trading signals. The project showcases how users can compose trading logic without writing code, though it raises questions about reliability and compliance. It’s a practical data-point in the trend toward no-code automation for finance.
items.summary_zh: Cryphos 提供无代码的加密信号机器人，并附带 Telegram 提醒，降低自动化交易的门槛。产品展示了用户无需编写代码即可构建交易逻辑的方式，但也引发对可靠性与合规性的疑问。这是无代码自动化在金融领域日益流行的实例。
